page.title: 11At School in Woodlesford
page.content: School starts at 9 00am.We go in for activities and fight for the comfortable chairs in the reading corner.For activities we paint,draw,sew and make all sorts of things.At cleaning up_time we usually miss half of play time because Mr.Butler won't let us out until every speck of dust is off the floor.After break we do maths.There are two groups.The first group do maths then change with the second group which has been writing or doing reading workshop or something.We take the chairs through for dinner at 12 00pm.The dinners are lovely but not everyone has them,some have sandwiches.We play out for an hour then we do reading.We sometimes have P.E. or games in the afternoon or we write stories or do the Domesday.
